Interests

Relationship issues

We are always in relationship, to ourselves, others and the world.

So whatever you bring will be about a relationship. However, I have a particular interest and training in the different stages of love... whether you are looking for love, struggling within a relationship, deciding whether to separate or have separated or divorced.

Online therapy

Need some help or some therapy, but location, family, travel committments,

restricted mobility or some other reason makes it difficult for you to come to any of my locations? Maybe online therapy could be a possiblity for you. Online therapy can be cheaper and after an initial consultation can be arranged at a time to suit you. Contact me to see if it could work for you.

Groups

Introduction to Mindfulness in English Mindful parenting.

Mindful mornings. Find out more! Can't afford individual therapy maybe group therapy is an option. Recently divorced or separated? Would you like a safe place to talk with people in a similar situation Contact me for more information on any of these groups

Supervision

Are you in training and need a qualified supervisor? Or in keeping with 'good practice' need supervision?

I am an accredited clinical supervisor. Contact me for more information
